title: Intersection collision
creator_credit: Amir M Karimi and University of California, Los Angeles. Media Center
brief_description: Provides information on intersection collision and on safety devices, and procedures that can reduce injuries. Discusses factors associated with door latch failure and motorist ejection, demonstrates the protection provided to motorists by the combined shoulder strap and lap belt, presents preliminary findings on tempered glass breakage, and illustrates car collision deformation and skid patterns.
